source.title: Iridaceae

leads.lead_text: Tufted or tussock-forming herb; leaves all basal
Small undershrub; leaves cauline on an erect slender stem
Inflorescence with non-flowering part and primary bracts glabrous
Inflorescence with non-flowering part and primary bracts silky
Inflorescence shorter than leaves; primary bracts green to pale brown, similar to leaves in texture
Inflorescence longer than the leaves; primary bracts brown or black, differing from leaves in texture
